title: Sherlock's Clueso
description: Participants solve a series of intricate cases through various detective tasks. Each level introduces a new format, from solving puzzles to decoding the codewords and uncovering hidden clues. This immersive experience will challenge their wits and creativity.
registration: Only college students are permitted to participate.
A valid college ID is mandatory.
Participants must wear the registration throughout the day.
Prior registration is mandatory to attend any event/workshops, either online or on-spot.
Re-entry is not allowed, and the fee paid for any event/workshops is non-refundable.
The team-head should register for the event, on behalf of the team.
rules: A team may consist of 2-4 members.
The event will consist of multiple rounds, each with different detective tasks.
Each round will be connected to the previous one.
Use of mobile phones or any external gadgets is strictly prohibited.
Additional instructions will be given at the start of the event.
Any team that violates the rules or engages in unsportsmanlike conduct may be disqualified.
